title: Use uploaded MauiLaneCareHome-4.jpg as logo on login page and header

requirements.summary: Add uploaded MauiLaneCareHome-4.jpg to frontend static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated for reliable IC serving.
acceptanceCriteria: The file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/MauiLaneCareHome-4.jpg in the codebase.
The image is accessible at runtime via the appâ€™s BASE_URL-prefixed path (no 404 in browser network panel).

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded logo image file to the committed static assets directory so it is served by the frontend in IC deployments.

requirements.summary: Update global branding configuration to point the logoPath to assets/generated/MauiLaneCareHome-4.jpg so BrandLogo renders it everywhere.
acceptanceCriteria: No other code path overrides the logo on the login screen or header.

file_operations.description: Replace the current BRAND.logoPath value with "assets/generated/MauiLaneCareHome-4.jpg" so BrandLogo resolves the new asset via BASE_URL consistently.

requirements.summary: Ensure ProtectedGate (logged out) and MauiAppShell header (logged in) show the uploaded logo via the existing BrandLogo with correct sizing and fallback behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: When logged out, the login card shows MauiLaneCareHome-4.jpg as the large logo (no initials fallback unless the image fails to load).
When logged in, the sticky header shows MauiLaneCareHome-4.jpg as the small logo.
No broken-image icon appears on either screen in a production build.

file_operations.description: Verify the login/sign-in screen continues to render the logo using the existing BrandLogo component (size "lg") and that no local override changes the logo source or breaks BASE_URL compatibility.
Verify the authenticated header continues to render the logo using the existing BrandLogo component (size "sm") and that no local override changes the logo source or breaks BASE_URL compatibility.
